title: Area of an unbounded exponential function

content.prompt: Let R be the region between the graph of y = e − 2 x MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFC@ and the x-axis forx≥3 . The area of R is

choices.label: 1 2 e 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CD7@

1 e 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C1B@

2 e 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C1C@

π 2 e 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DD9@

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
